{{cpp/named req/navbar}}

{{named req/core|ContiguousContainer}}是在连续的内存位置中存储对象的{{named req|Container}}。

===要求===
以下情况下，类型 {{tt|X}} 满足{{named req/core|ContiguousContainer}}：
* 类型 {{tt|X}} 满足{{named req|Container}}
* 类型 {{tt|X}} 支持{{named req|RandomAccessIterator}}
* 成员类型 {{c|X::iterator}} 与 {{c|X::const_iterator}} 满足{{rev inl|until=c++20|{{named req|ContiguousIterator}}}}{{rev inl|since=c++20| {{lconcept|contiguous_iterator}}}}

===标准库===
下列标准库字符串类型和容器均满足{{named req/core|ContiguousContainer}}：
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/string/dsc basic_string}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/dsc vector}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/dsc array}}
{{dsc inc|cpp/container/dsc inplace_vector}}
{{dsc end}}
